name: places/ChIJ31kB3gz2wokRgyOA4FYGL6o
formattedAddress: 63 W 125th St 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 63 W 125th St 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10027, USA

originalText.text: Poor service- my daughter arrived at 9:15am for a 9:30am appointment at 10am she was still not seen. She left and came back at 11am and still wasn’t seen… the doctor has a bad attitude and although we have been attending here for years now it has been a very difficult experience. They don’t have appointments for weeks- months… just not a good experience.

originalText.text: The orthodontist in the black scrubs was very rude to my son. She told my autistic son that if she were to cut his mouth that it was his problem not hers. My youngest son heard her and told me. When I confronted her about it she denied it and brushed me off. Horrible she should be speaking to patients that way

text.text: The orthodontist in the black scrubs was very rude to my son. She told my autistic son that if she were to cut his mouth that it was his problem not hers. My youngest son heard her and told me. When I confronted her about it she denied it and brushed me off. Horrible she should be speaking to patients that way

originalText.text: Staff here so always friendly, especially the lady in the front reception area. She’s always so sweet and helpful. Best part about this place is their prices. I’ve searched all over for affordable braces for my child and this was by far the best. And their payment plans are great also. Would recommend this place to everyone.

text.text: Staff here so always friendly, especially the lady in the front reception area. She’s always so sweet and helpful. Best part about this place is their prices. I’ve searched all over for affordable braces for my child and this was by far the best. And their payment plans are great also. Would recommend this place to everyone.

originalText.text: At first I didn’t like this place because the doctors they had didn’t know what they was doing when I was telling them about the bracket putting too much pressure on my gums. They told me to get a deep cleaning which had nothing to do with it and I was still having pain. The owner was not understanding. I spoke with the nice receptionist and she insisted on me to stay and see another doctor who told me I did get an infection because of the bracket. Im satisfied with the new doctor and the receptionist thanks to her.

originalText.text: my experiences going to Harlem Braces has been a Pleasant. The young lady at the receptionist desk is always so nice and helpful she goes by the name Jessica. As I was waiting to get seen I notice that Jessica seems to be a great worker she seems to know a lot about working as a dental assistance as well as a receptionist. She deserves a raise.. once agin thank you for the Great experience.
